pages.text: $(l)INFORMATION: $(br)$()These creatures roam around the wide world, attacking those who bother them. These creatures are blessed with a very special type of immunity, with variants that correspond to it's own block. These creatures vary in many ways, it's strength and power vary for each variant.

[Hellmode-exclusive only, this can be changed in the config.] These creatures spawn when it's corresponding variants' corresponding block is broken by a player. This can be prevented by an early game item that you have to explore.
